Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "In addition" (this is a conjunction connecting two clauses, not a material name)
* "no shoulder peaks were observed" (this is a sentence fragment, not a material name)
* "indicating" (this is a linking verb, not a material name)
* "stronger intermolecular interaction" (this is a sentence fragment, not a material name)
